author: Adaku.
text:
Mentally block that thing that is stressing you. Be happy... Try. 
Happy last day of the month, April. 💕

author: Adaku.
text: Guard your heart in such a way that, anyone who wants it, must go through God to get it.

text: Let the peace of God that surpasses all understanding, guard my heart and mind in Christ, now and forever.💓

text: What is mine, I'll never miss. 💌

author: Adaku.
text:
Good morning everyone.
Have a great day today! 😊

author: Adaku.
text: They thought the game would boom today, alas Man U had better plans. 🙂

author: Adaku.
text:
From the first to the second, I knew both were unreal. Had to fall again and awoke to reality.
Does this resonates with you?
Or perhaps my brain is wired in such a way that, once my dream's setting, is my place of birth, I'd know it's not real.

author: Adaku.
text:
Are you able to differentiate your nightmares from real life? 
I do have nightmares where I know it's not real, and I'd be like "I'm dreaming. Lemme wake up." Then I fall, or hit myself. Then I'm up. 
This morning I woke up from two nightmares.

author: Adaku.
text:
Bayern really wantu lose to Villarreal though?😐 Benzema milked a hat-trick off Chelsea! 😂 
Some games will cut tonight. 😬

author: Adaku.
text:
There are some people that would do you dirty, and to apologize, they'll wait for days, only to send you 'Good morning.'
As if to say, ghosting you is an apology. Too bad.

author: Adaku.
text: Dear God, I cannot do this alone. Help. Please.

author: Adaku.
text: You will find love, until then, find yourself. 💌

author: Adaku.
text: Gradually learning to let go and let God. 😊💕

author: Adaku.
text: Forgive yourself.

author: Adaku.
text: Tomorrow's not promised, say sorry when you hurt someone. 🙂

author: Adaku.
text: I am grateful for everything that has happened, still happening, and everything yet to be, in my life. I am grateful, dearest 17. 🤲🏼♥️

author: Adaku.
text: I am thankful for the friends that speak life into me, when I'm about losing it. May God continue to bless them. 🤗♥️

author: Adaku.
text:
We are all going to be fine... One step at a time.
Until then, keep walking, working towards it.
Don't stop. 🤗💕

author: Adaku.
text:
"No one will change you, not even a new born. No one but you.
Thank you for the fan, and for the night you left." ♥️💡
#TwosDay

author: Adaku.
text: Be a little bit kinder today. 🤗

author: Adaku.
text:
Another day to try again. 💕

author: Adaku.
text:
He's not mine, I'm not his. But that's okay.
C'est la vie. 💕

author: Adaku.
text:
When I'm feeling down, I call people. Not necessarily to talk about me, but to check up on them... Doing this, makes me feel better. 🤗
God help us.

author: Adaku.
text:
To you...
There is no heartbreak, no unrequited love, no hate, indifference —or even hurtful words, that would make me stop loving, the way I do.
It will be too much for anyone who isn't mine... Until I meet you. 💌
